item.title: USESO Scavenger Hunt
item.description: How the Hunt Works The hunt works in the following manner. This first page is going to give you a clue, which will lead you to the next url. To guess the next page, go to will-s-h.github.io/(the answer you think it is). If you are correct, the website should show the next clue; if not, you will get a 404 error. The answer will consist only of lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and numbers.
